price: ئاللاھ كېچىنى كۈندۈزگە كىرگۈزىدۇ، كۈندۈزنى كېچىگە كىرگۈزىدۇ، ئاللاھ دىللاردىكى سىرلارنى بىلگۈچىدۇر[6].
arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wahuwa ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
translations: of what is in the breasts
of what is in the breasts
